parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.00
</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> DLC

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns DLC information about given object or model.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getAssetDLCInfo]] asset

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> asset: [[Object]] or [[String]] - object reference or path to the model

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - array in format: [isDlc, isOwned, isInstalled, isAvailable, appID, DLCName], where:
* isDlc: [[Boolean]] - the asset belongs to a DLC
* isOwned: [[Boolean]] 
* isInstalled: [[Boolean]] 
* isAvailable: [[Boolean]] 
* appID: [[String]] - actual steam item ID or "0" for none or "-1" for unknown 
* DLCName: [[String]] - actual DLC name or ""

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[getAssetDLCInfo]] [class, config]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [class, config]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - class name of the asset
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> config (Optional): [[Config]] - config to search in, default: <tt>[[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles"</tt>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - array in format: [isDlc, isOwned, isInstalled, isAvailable, appID, DLCName], where:
* isDlc: [[Boolean]] - the asset belongs to a DLC
* isOwned: [[Boolean]] 
* isInstalled: [[Boolean]] 
* isAvailable: [[Boolean]] 
* appID: [[String]] - actual steam item ID or "0" for none or "-1" for unknown 
* DLCName: [[String]] - actual DLC name or ""
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getAssetDLCInfo]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[getAssetDLCInfo]] "a3\Weapons_F_Enoch\Rifles\MSBS\MSBS65_F";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[getAssetDLCInfo]] ["C_Van_01_transport_F"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[getAssetDLCInfo]] ["arifle_AK12_F", [[configFile]] >> "CfgWeapons"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getDLCs]], [[getObjectDLC]], [[getPersonUsedDLCs]], [[getMissionDLCs]], [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]], [[getDLCAssetsUsage]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
